item.description:
Groove Alliance is a nine-piece dance and show band that is built around the dynamic vocals of  Mike Greene and Amy Fichera.

Mike is a spirited, positive front man with a strong and clear tenor voice.  He is a natural singer, bandleader, and entertainer. Mike’s presentation skills are unmatched by any other professional working vocalist in New England.
Amy Fichera is one of Boston's hottest vocalists and entertainer. Whether its a cool jazzy ballad by Nora Jones; a fiery R&B Aretha Franklin standard; or an upbeat Katy Perry dance tune, Amy will simply knock your socks off! Amy's outstanding   stage presence and sharp vocal harmonies are unsurpassed by any female performer in Boston!

The combination of these two powerful voices, tight music, smokin' horns, and great vocals adds up to one thing, a night of quality entertainment and an event you  will remember for years to come.

I can get there around 8pm to get us a table most likely to the left in the rear of the lounge.

RSVP for Dinner/Dancing (Casual/No Cover)

 

Band Starts 9pm
item.how_to_find_us: When you enter the tables to the left in the rear of the lounge Meet Up sign posted.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Groove to the Sounds of "Groove Alliance" Derryfield
